text: Mankind will never win lasting peace so long as men use their full resources only in tasks of war. While we are yet at peace, let us mobilize the potentialities, particularly the moral and spiritual potentialities, which we usually reserve for war.
author: John Foster Dulles

text: Take away the violence and who will hear the men of peace?
author: Lorraine Hansberry

text: War is not the only arena where peace is done to death.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

text: The Nobel Peace Prize opened up a door in my heart.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

text: My opinion is the greatest reward that any government could get is the approval of the people. If the people are happy and the people are at peace and the government has done something for them, that's the greatest reward I think any government could hope for.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi
